overview:
Bertil is a career driven individual, who has excelled at business strategy & development, sales, communication and marketing of both products and services, across a variety of industries, markets and countries.

He has the business acumen and the insight to strategically turn a challenging situation into a positive profitable outcome. Renowned for his enthusiasm and wit, Bertil is a motivated, multilingual team player who is outgoing and exceptional at networking at all levels across an organization.

With an International exposure of over 10 years, Bertil used his skills and knowledge for Global organizations both for-profit and not-for-profit based in European, Taiwan and China today, where he is based since 2010.

Based on his previous successes, Bertil makes its strengths, business skills and networks available to a wider range or Corporations willing to see their Business growing successfully and internationally.
